casebody.data:
CROWELL
v.
CROWELL 31A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Thomas D. Bumgardner, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Crowell, Andrea Kirby. Amy Simpson Fiorenza, Attorney at Law, for Crowell, William Worrell.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of January 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 18th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
